articles.title: Data shows Sinovac or Pfizer vaccines equally effective against Covid-19 infection - The Online Citizen Asia
articles.description: The Online Citizen Asia Data shows Sinovac or Pfizer vaccines equally effective against Covid-19 infection Letters
articles.content:
by Dr Ong Hean Teik
The Malaysian government’s temporary halting of the Sinovac vaccine roll out has been incorrectly reported as reflecting its lack of confidence in Sinovac efficacy. Nothing is fu… [+2907 chars]

articles.title: Lured by $2 payout, woman loses over $70000 in job scam - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - All it took was a few clicks to like a few videos and comments on a social media page, and Amanda (not her real name) earned $2. "I thought it was a pretty simple task," she said, adding that she was paid via PayNow. But that easy money, introduce…

articles.title: Thousands of PS4s Being Used As a FIFA Ultimate Team Bot Farm Seized by Ukrainian Police - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: This mining farm was initially thought to be for cryptocurrency.
articles.content: Thousands of PS4s from a supposed cryptocurrency farm in Ukraine that were seized last week were actually being used to grind FIFA Ultimate Team for various accounts that would then be sold on the bl… [+1952 chars]
